definition: to import/imported/entrance/inlet (for the intake of air, water etc)
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: The major technique norms have over taken those of importations.
sentences.chinese: 主要技术指标超过原进口产品。

sentences.english: Still, Japan quickly suspended imports of American long-grain rice.
sentences.chinese: 日本立即做出反应，暂缓对美国长粒大米的进口。

sentences.english: The new government imposed a special tax  on imported wines.
sentences.chinese: 新政府对进口酒征收特别税。

sentences.english: The non-energy resources are not abundant in Britain, It mainly dependent on imports of industrial raw materials.
sentences.chinese: 英国的非能源资源不丰富，主要工业原料依赖进口。

sentences.english: A separate inlet with a ceramic frit is used to aerate the perfusate.
sentences.chinese: 用玻璃料制成的一个独立进口暴露在灌流液中。

sentences.english: An accurate description will help the Customs Authority of the country of destination to clear the products quickly.
sentences.chinese: 准确的货物名称有助于进口国海关快速清关。

sentences.english: Care must be taken to completely seal entrance plugs(eg. at a manway)in refractory linings.
sentences.chinese: 必须小心地完全封闭耐火材料衬里的进口门。

sentences.english: Can you help calculate our import duty?
sentences.chinese: 你能帮我们算一下进口税吗？

sentences.english: China's iron-ore import volumes actually fell in 2010.
sentences.chinese: 中国2010年铁矿石进口量反而下降。

sentences.english: In fact, we import more gasoline into Afghanistan than any other product.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，我们从阿富汗进口最多的物资就是汽油。

sentences.english: Yad entrance mine market both showed a high consolidation positive trend.
sentences.chinese: 连日来进口矿市场皆呈现出高位盘整向上的趋势。

sentences.english: It arranged for its importation into England with the intention of re-exporting it.
sentences.chinese: 被告意图将这批药品进口至英格兰后再转出口。
关闭非重要的空气进口。

sentences.english: A home-made typewriter costs less than an imported one maybe.
sentences.chinese: 我们国产打字机可能要比进口的便宜。

sentences.english: The government plans to slap a new tariff on imported goods.
sentences.chinese: 政府计划对进口货物征收新关锐。

sentences.english: Imported meat products must come from non-epizootic disease countries or regions.
sentences.chinese: 进口的肉类产品应来自无动物疫病流行的国家或地区。

definition: general trade (i.e. importing and export without processing)
an exit/CL:個|个[ge4]/to speak/to export/(of a ship) to leave port
to procure (for an enterprise etc)/to purchase
to produce/to manufacture/to give birth to a child
to sell in the domestic market/domestic market
